title: Life Drain
summaries: The Life Drain is a Hardmode magic weapon that has a 20% chance to be dropped by the Crimson Mimic found in the Crimson biome.

When used, it deals constant damage to all enemies near the cursor's position, as long as the distance between the player and the cursor is unobstructed. A stream of red particles flows toward the user from each targeted enemy. While the weapon is in use, the user receives the Life Drain buff, which adds 2.5 life per second to existing <linked>health regeneration</linked>.
While an enemy is being damaged by Life Drain, it is also afflicted with a special <linked>debuff</linked> that deals 5 damage per tick.
The Life Drain is unable to deal critical hits, and does not trigger either Spectre armor set bonus.

statistics.Damage: 35 / 30 (Magic)
